website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Drive 4 delivers so well in aspects that matter. Many wearers agree that it has great traction, with a significant number saying that it can be used on both indoor and outdoor courts. The way that it hugs the foot maximizes the wearer’s range of movement. Making the UA Drive 4 more palatable is its price that several consider as reasonable given all the goodness that it brings.
pros: Many wearers love that this pair of kicks from Under Armour is attractive
It shares a similar style with the HOVR Havoc
There are mentions from a lot of buyers that the Under Armour Drive 4 is comfortable
Several purchasers love that this shoe has the capacity to last long even if used daily under high physical pressures
This shoe is a hit, as evidenced by the high overall satisfaction ratings that it gets from many buyers
Some testers note that Under Armour is really able to maximize the traction power of the herringbone pattern on the outsole of this shoe
Some users say that this pair of shoes work well on both outdoor and indoor courts
The same can be said of the Air Jordan 1 Retro High
Plenty of wearers express their willingness to recommend this pair of basketball kicks to those who are close to them
Using tightly woven mesh on the upper may have worked because there are mentions of how this shoe is so light and breathable
A good number of buyers agree that the Under Armour Drive 4 is reasonably priced
Given that the shoe is of the right size, several users agree the shoe’s fit and support make jumping and running a lot easier
Many users share that this hoops shoe can be used for other activities such as running and weightlifting
cons: At least one wearer reports that the laces of the UA  Drive 4 is not long enough to achieve the desired snugness
A lot of users report that the Drive 4 from Under Armour runs smaller than expected
There are a few reports of how the external heel counter dug to the wearers’ skin, hurting instead of protecting it

customer_reviews.title: Fits great with my richie brace.
customer_reviews.text: First impression are that these shoes are comfortable, sturdy, well made, and it’s a good looking shoe. The reviews where very helpful for gauging the size to by, I’m a 11.5 US D. I ordered a size 12 D and they fit perfectly in my opinion. There is a huge up side to these Under Armour Drive 4, they fit my richie brace ( Posterior Tibial Tendon Dysfunction (PTTD) ) got mine in a fall. I got these shoes 3 hours ago, I’v played shot the basketball for an hour and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: ... length game already so I think I have a pretty good idea of how they'll work
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for 1 week but I have played in full length game already so I think I have a pretty good idea of how they'll work. I have wide feet, and this shoe is perfect for me. They were so comfortable and I'm not sure if I will ever get a different pair. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Austen Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: This shoe has great support and is built solidly
customer_reviews.text: I saw a podiatrist that treated the Utah Jazz when I was younger and he told me to also buy shoes that you are unable to bend the shoe down the middle (arch area). This shoe has great support and is built solidly. I added some athletic insoles for better cushion. I started getting some serious blisters on my ankles when I tied up the laces completely. I fixed the issue by simply not lacing the second from the top holes. Overall, I've really liked these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker, not for wide footers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this sneaker but in the end my wide foot disagreed. On a good note, they are very lightweight and very grippy on a clean wood floor. Unfortunately, i went up 1/2 size to make up for the potentially narrow toe area, but it was way, way too narrow. The the box was very short so the shoe was squeezing my foot up, pressing up to the toe. If you have a normally narrow (or regular) foot, i still would probably go up 1/2 a size. I regularly wear a 10.5 and with an 11, my foot had about a finger-width of space before the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: The back of this shoe is awful
customer_reviews.text: I think they were trying to go with stability in the back of this shoe, but it makes it actually a really awkward fit and less functional when trying to do anything athletic. I think this is possibly the worst shoe I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Alan

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice looking shoe. However the design is flawed. I primarily wear Under Armour shoes because of the athletic fit. but for some reason, there is no room for movement in the toe and mid foot area. If the design made it a little wider, it would be a perfect fit. Needless to say, I was disappointed. Other than the fact it didn't fit me, THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH THIS SHOE! If there was a wider size I would reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basketball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pros Good quality. I have arched feet and it supports it well. Looks good Great ankle support Good cushion feel Great price Cons I have wider feet so it tends to cause pain after i'm done playing basketball It does fit narrow and tight Grip not as well as advertised New cushion technology used is nice but not like Nikes Hard to get into and get foot out Used to play indoor basketball
customer_reviews.author: Yahya

customer_reviews.title: The design is striking
customer_reviews.text: They have been my first pair of Under Armor tennis, I liked them for their quality, material configuration, presentation and finishing. With the time of use, I can say that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricon

customer_reviews.title: Wear with high socks
customer_reviews.text: I got this show because of the good reviews and high ankle support. I’ve had a history of rolling my ankles and no it wasn’t because I was constantly getting crossed over! Lol! But if you wear low socks with them they high ankle support can be a little uncomfortable at first rubbing on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian A.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes, mine may have a small flaw
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes but on the left shoe there is a spot that feels like metal digging into my ankle which makes it hard to try to run and use these for basketball. Trying to break them in further to see if it can go away.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerMac

customer_reviews.title: Great fit per husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them!! I was unaware that they came with two pairs of shoe laces one pair is orange and the other is grey just like the shoes, and we got them exactly when they said they would come
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Marie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great quality, slightly narrow around the arch.
customer_reviews.text: These felt great when I played in them. The arch felt shaped to my foot which is unusual considering I have petite feet. Also, it was surprisingly narrow around the arch (even for me) area but it’s not uncomfortably narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Cmazon Austomer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great when wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Feels great when wearing them. Looks good as well. I am totally satisfied. The only drawback (which is not major) is that I have to really open up the laces, in order to get it on. However once on they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Tillman Jr

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 14 y/o son. He absolutely loves them and wants them in another color. He likes them so much that he chooses to keep them nice and only wear them for certain things... That is a first!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Leigh Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I order 8. 5 sizes but it is so ...
customer_reviews.text: I order 8.5 sizes but it is so small for me. I had to return it back. Try to order an advance size, not the regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small which is stupid
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but it runs way too small. Terrible job on that front Under Armour!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Piskulic

customer_reviews.title: Definitely more narrow around the arch than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Adding another 6" of shoestring so you can lace all the way up was apparently shot down by corporate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: fit its perfect and are super confortable to wear, totally worth the price, and added to that it have a great look.
customer_reviews.author: jose arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Grip is amazing and the shoes is relatively comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Grip is amazing and the shoes is relatively comfortable. 2* rating because after about 20-30 hrs of playing, the bottom sole ripped off at the L Lateral edge. A shoe should not fail that quickly into it's life. Disappointing durability.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE AF!
customer_reviews.text: COMFORTABLE AF!!!! This is perfect for WIDE/FLAT/ footed players. It’s so comfortable playing in. Especially if your a baller and in league . This is the shoe you won’t regret
customer_reviews.author: mnsanlors

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a great shoe. A little hard to put on and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great shoe. A little hard to put on and tie due to the large tounge of the shoe, but perfect for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Riedel

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were at least a half size too small ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were at least a half size too small. Because they were my first high top shoes I kept them thinking they would loosen up. That did not happen. Now I will donate to charity as I wore them too much to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Michela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I'm an 11, got 11kinda tight when putting them on they are OK once on.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Size 14 is a good fit, a bit snug, no room for thick socks but not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ancle support
customer_reviews.text: It fits great, playing basketball in this shoe is very comfortable. The ancle support is excellent, and it holds up well to the stress. I would recommend these to anyone looking for an affordable basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne Mckoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They fit well & look nice. Great shoes for either outdoors or the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came very quick. Very satisfied with the fit and the feel of this shoe. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: If they ran a little bigger I would’ve easily given them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Eichler

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect, size perfect and good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect, size perfect and good quality. My husband absolutely loves them so I'm buying another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Havoc's RIB 💕

customer_reviews.title: awesome..
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this item... awesome... It covered all my expectations... I recommend this pair of shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: i wear an 10.5 size to play
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it!!!! Amazing shoe, i bought it to play basketball and this shoe is the best one i ever had!
customer_reviews.author: javier marzan

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is everything you expect,good support,lightweight, and true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a valentine's gift for my husband,who is a basketball coach, and the all green and white ones for our 11yr old son,and 8yr old daughter who play AAU basketball. Can i just say #TEAMCURRY they love them!! Thanks Under Armour for a great shoe that offers great support,and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: leticia

customer_reviews.title: Gym Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very tight around the ankles when taking them off. Laces aren't the best, I recommend changing them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great, are light and didn't break the bank. 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Steffy

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy.
customer_reviews.text: My first Under Armour shoe and very disappointed. The laces continue to come untied while playing and the shoe has caused an abrasion in each ankle from rubbing. Would like to return and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Perez

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: The straps ripped after a month or so of use, now the laces are loose around the the toes
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy miles

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe and look although I wish it were a wider fit.
customer_reviews.author: larry m.james

customer_reviews.title: Very firm ankle protector
customer_reviews.text: The grip is just amazing indoor/outdoor, I hope it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: X-Webber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoe. Just had to put my inserts in for better arch support and the shoe laces are not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robotic Servers

customer_reviews.title: not a big fan of this shoe. i had ...
customer_reviews.text: not a big fan of this shoe. i had high expectations but got let down. the plastic heel part dug into my ankles and literally cut them up on both left and right. only played in these for an hour
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: I could not recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I could not recommend these to anyone. After a little use, the fabric on the top of the tow starts to separate itself from the material under it. We exchanged our first pair to make sure it wasn't just a defect but the second pair ended up with the same issue after about a week or so. It seems what is happening is where the glue/adhere the designed overlap piece on top, it comes undone with use and starts to peel away. This leaves the shoes looking very cheap. They otherwise look great for a couple days, until this starts coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. They do fit small though, so I ended up having to get 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not my item I don't know why this in showing on my account
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SUPER NARROW ,,, can't return... now stuck with them
customer_reviews.author: chuck jarman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they fit just as it said and they came early!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darell Hall

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO DO SPORTS WITH THIS RUBBER SHOE
customer_reviews.text: HARD RUBBER - IMPOSSIBLE TO RUN WITH THIS DON'T BUY TO DO ANY KIND OF SPORT, ITS JUST TO WALK, AND HURTS THE ANKLE
customer_reviews.author: Thiago S.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable basketball shoes I've worn so far
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been looking for. Most comfortable basketball shoes I've worn so far.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Tennison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 13 but the shoe felt like a 12 but they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Santino Simon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought my size but its too small to wear
customer_reviews.author: MIN HO LEE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Be careful q with the size, because the top of the shoe is really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Quispe

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 0 if I could. They don’t fit, I ordered size 11 men’s and it is impossible to fit your foot into the top. Stay far away.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Guluzy

customer_reviews.title: What a deal on a great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this so bad. I tried ordering a pair before this one but I never received it. I saw this one a couple of weeks later and couldn't resist trying again. I was skeptical about buying this online where I wouldn't have an opportunity to try them on first but, after watching as many reviews as I could find on YouTube (and there aren't many) I decided to go with the size 11. Best choice I could've made. Fits exactly as I like my shoes to fit -with a little room to the front so I could wear an extra pair of socks or thicker socks if necessary. Great price. great deal. Love these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kenson Joseph

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Drive 4 Basketball Shoes, Blaze Orange (800)/White Black Size: 7.5 UK
product_meta.description: Synthetic upper with moulded quarter inserts for breathable, textured support that snaps comfortably into the foot. With well thought-out perforations and mesh tongue for more ventilation. Moulded EVA insole for comfort underfoot Full-length EVA midsole provides a lightweight, comfortable ride. One piece full rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern for exceptional side/linear movement and control.
feature_bullets: Full boot construction with molded ankle collar for added structure, extended support and a snug, comfortable fit
External heel cap provides extra support and holds the back of the foot firmly
